content_analysis.posting_frequency: 3 long-form videos per week + daily Shorts
content_analysis.style_notes: Educational content with high production value. Fast-paced editing with jump cuts. Direct-to-camera talking head style. Heavy use of captions and text overlays. Focus shifted from wide topics (fitness, relationships) to narrow business-specific content for business owner audience.
content_analysis.video_length: Long-form content prioritized over short-form for attracting engaged viewers
content_analysis.upload_consistency: Never misses deadlines - works with agency for accountability
content_analysis.content_repurposing: Creates once, then multiplies into 250-300+ pieces weekly across all platforms using AI-powered workflow

top_performing_videos.title: Give me 20 Minutes and I'll Give You Back 20 Years of Your Life
If you're watching this we did a $100 million book launch
We get 34.2M Views a Month. Here's how (just copy me)

strategic_shifts: Prioritized revenue over views, focusing on revenue per thousand impressions (RPM)
Emphasized long-form content over short-form for more engaged viewers
Moved from wide topics to narrow, business-centric topics
Targeted business owners specifically rather than general audience
